text: Bachelor Nation is waiting for the other shoe ( or should we say rose ) to drop after Arie Luyendyk Jr. faced a cryptic confrontation during the Women Tell All special Sunday evening. It's not clear what Caroline Luddy meant when she came at the Bachelor during his segment of the two - hour special : ` ` I know what you did and I don't know how you could do that,'' she said angrily, ` ` and I just really don't understand... but I really hope you found what you're looking for.'' But why did Caroline call Arie out? Her friendship with the other women in the series. The realtor told E!
